```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE

library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(prettymapr)
library(ggspatial)
```

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
place <- "Lake Erie, United States"

building_query <- opq(place) |>
  add_osm_feature(key = "natural")

building_data <- osmdata_sf(building_query)
```

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE

buildings <- building_data$osm_polygons

ggplot() +
  annotation_map_tile(type = "cartolight", zoom = 8) +
  geom_sf(data = buildings, fill = "darkgreen", color = NA)

```
